exception.formatocoord: The entered coordinates are not in the correct format.
exception.nodetectado: No geometries have been detected in this file.
exception.comprobar: Error loading the file. Verify that this is the correct file.
exception.insertado: A permitted file extension has not been inserted. The allowed ones are: KML, SHP (.zip), GPX and GeoJSON.
exception.maxfichero: The selected file exceeds the maximum of 20 MB allowed
exception.ficherosel: Download format has not been selected.
exception.query_profile: The altitude data for this entity could not be queried.
exception.topographic_one_element: The topographic profile can only be made for a single element

help_template.title: Help
help_template.addlayer_content: This tool adds a new vector layer to the map. Clicking on it opens a window in which you can enter the layer name.
help_template.selection_content: Tool for selecting elements of the layer. There are several tools that work differently if this tool is active or not.
help_template.creation_content: Tool to draw different types of geometries on the selected layer.
help_template.creation_content_1_1: Allows you to draw a point by clicking on the map.
help_template.creation_content_2_1: Allows you to create a point by entering the coordinates.
help_template.creation_content_3_1: Allows you to draw a line on the map. One click draws a point or vertex, double click finishes the drawing.
help_template.creation_content_4_1: Allows you to draw a polygon on the map. One click draws a point or vertex, double click finishes the drawing.
help_template.creation_content_5_1: Allows you to draw a regular or irregular shape on the map. One click sets the top left corner, a second click finishes the drawing.
help_template.creation_content_6_1: Allows you to write text at a point on the map.
help_template.edition_content: Tool to edit the geometries of the layer elements.
help_template.edition_content_1_1: Allows you to edit the vertices of a geometry
help_template.edition_content_2_1: Allows you to create a hole in an element. Only valid for polygons.
help_template.edition_content_3_1: Allows you to rotate the selected elements.
help_template.edition_content_5_1: Allows you to move the selected elements.
help_template.edition_content_6_1: Allows you to edit the attributes of the layer or selected elements.
help_template.edition_content_7_1: Allows you to delete all elements of the layer.
help_template.style_content: Tool to edit the styles of the layer or selected elements. They are divided into styles for point, line or polygon.
help_template.analysis_content_1_1: Allows you to display a graph that represents the relief of the terrain. In the case of specific elements, only their height and coordinates are indicated.
help_template.analysis_content_2_1: Allows you to draw an area of influence of an element.
help_template.download_content: This tool allows you to download the complete layer or selected elements in GeoJSON, KML and Shapefile format.

clear_geometries_msg: Are you sure you want to remove all elements from the layer?
